sorcer.falcon.base

Interface Conditional

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IfExertion, WhileExertion

    public interface Conditional
    An Conditional is a closure with its service dataContext for its free variables in the form of path/value pairs with paths being guards's parameters.
    See Also:
    //* @see WhileExertion //* @see IfExertion

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getExpression()
      Returns the boolean expression for the condition.
      Map<String,Object> getReferencingMap()
      Returns the a referencing environment for the non-local variables inside this Conditional.
      boolean isTrue()
      The isTrue method is responsible for evaluating the condition component of the Conditonal.
      void setConditionalContext(Context context)
      This sets the dataContext of the Condtion component with the current modified dataContext by the provider for evaluation.

    • Method Detail

      • isTrue

        boolean isTrue()
               throws ExertionException
        The isTrue method is responsible for evaluating the condition component of the Conditonal. Thus returning the boolean value true or false.
        Returns:
        boolean true or false depending on the condition
        Throws:
        ExertionException - if there is any problem within the isTrue method.

      • setConditionalContext

        void setConditionalContext(Context context)
                           throws ContextException
        This sets the dataContext of the Condtion component with the current modified dataContext by the provider for evaluation.
        Parameters:
        context - the modified dataContext by the provider
        Throws:
        ContextException - problem regarding setting or retrieving values in the dataContext

      • getReferencingMap

        Map<String,Object> getReferencingMap()
        Returns the a referencing environment for the non-local variables inside this Conditional. It is a mapping between a given variable name to the corresponding data path in the service dataContext related to this conditional. This mapping is used by the condition evaluator (isTrue) method.
        Returns:
        Map for the reference

      • getExpression

        String getExpression()
        Returns the boolean expression for the condition. This expression dictates the evaluation of the isTrue method.
        Returns:
        String this is the boolean expression
